WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc.summary: The WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc extension is part of the WebGL API and exposes four PVRTC compressed texture formats.

remarks.para: Compressed textures reduce the amount of memory needed to store a texture on the GPU, allowing for higher resolution textures or more of the same resolution textures.
WebGL extensions are available using the method. For more information, see also Using Extensions in the WebGL tutorial.

blockquote.para:
PVRTC is typically only available on mobile devices with PowerVR chipsets.
It is used in all generations of the iPhone, iPod Touch and iPad and supported on certain Android devices that use a PowerVR GPU.
This extension is available to both, {{domxref("WebGLRenderingContext", "WebGL1", "", 1)}} and {{domxref("WebGL2RenderingContext", "WebGL2", "", 1)}} contexts.
On iOS devices, this extension is named WEBKIT_WEBGL_compressed_texture_pvrtc.
